alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles; Evangeline; Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Rapides, north central Evangeline and southwestern Avoyelles Parishes through 300 AM CDT... At 230 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Flatwoods to near Glenmora to near Oakdale. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alexandria, Pineville, Bunkie, Cheneyville, Turkey Creek, Alexandria International Airport, Ball, Lecompte, Libuse, Echo, Tioga, Timber Trails, Kingsville, Poland, Kolin, Ruby, Paradise, Esler Regional Airport, Woodworth and Forest Hill. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 50 and 95. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for central Louisiana.
